purpose: Provide an intuitive graphical user interface for interacting with large language models, both on local machines and in the cloud.
principle: Built using Rust for performance and safety, leveraging the Makepad framework for GUI development, and integrating with various LLM APIs for AI capabilities.
reusability: Designed with modularity in mind, allowing integration with different LLMs and deployment on various platforms. Offers a flexible architecture for extending functionality.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have limited features and potential stability issues. Compatibility with specific LLMs or cloud services might require additional configuration.
name: moly
description: Moly: A Desktop + Cloud AI LLM GUI app in pure Rust
highlight: A versatile AI LLM GUI application built entirely in Rust, supporting both desktop and cloud environments.
